alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:06PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Douglas and central Jefferson Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 606 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Platte, or 24 miles southwest of Denver, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Highlands Ranch, Castle Rock, southwestern Parker, Roxborough Park, Castle Pines, Louviers, Buffalo Creek, Sedalia, Sprucewood, South Platte and The Pinery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
